title: OnePlus 8 and 8T get first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta based on Android 12
content:
While OnePlus is gearing up for the global launch of the OnePlus 10 Pro, the company is also reminding users that it hasn’t forgotten about some of its older flagships. Today, the company has released the Android 12 update for three older flagships via its Open Beta program. Owners of the OnePlus 8, 8 Pro,

The post OnePlus 8 and 8T get first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta based on Android 12 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The first Open Beta release of Android 12-based OxygenOS 12 for the OnePlus 8, 8 Pro, and the OnePlus 8T is here. Read on to know more!
